unraveled.name: Unraveled
unraveled.description: You retrieved the Blue Wool from Samwell in the Masquerader's Ruin

sporetalcombat.name: Sporetal Combat
sporetalcombat.description: You attended Conquort's Funeral, but were interrupted by the Abello requesting help to fight back against the Godspore.

assisteddreaming.name: Assisted Dreaming
assisteddreaming.description: After an adventure with Reynart through your dreams, you stumbled across the Exalted Dungeons hub!

praetorerstrike.name: Praetorer Strike
praetorerstrike.description: You battled through a Shade-infested Point of Interest to help the Praetor of New Antium.

cureforinsomnia.name: Cure for Insomnia
cureforinsomnia.description: You passed out after performing a ritual, and woke up inside The Gallery of Fear.

starlessnight.name: Starless Night
starlessnight.description: Working with Silver Knight Tuulen and Aurora, you destroyed Sirius, the Final Herald of the Stars. Now the search for the Indigo Wool can begin in earnest.

centuremlost.name: Centurem Lost
centuremlost.description: You discovered the Lycan intrusion into the keep and freed the centurem from their clutches.

hisfaithfulservant.name: His Faithful Servant
hisfaithfulservant.description: You discovered the Shrines of the Architect's Ring, alongside Cadeus.

ringaroundtherose.name: Ring Around the Rose
ringaroundtherose.description: You assisted a group of researchers in order to figure out how to reach the Architect's Ring.

unconventionalmethods.name: Unconventional Methods
unconventionalmethods.description: You scavanged tombs for Void and answers, while Calder wreaked havoc elsewhere.

behindthestarlitshroud.name: Behind the Starlit Shroud
behindthestarlitshroud.description: Following the trail of Stargazers from the King's Valley, you discovered a path to the Serebrium Citadel and danger aplenty.

forwhomthebelltolls.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
forwhomthebelltolls.description: After exploring around Star Point, you discovered and unlocked all of the bell towers.

silentknight.name: Silent Knight
silentknight.description: You learned about the festive season of Silvernalia while helping Gertrude find her stinky cat.

asiriusproblem.name: A Sirius Problem
asiriusproblem.description: You met up with Silver Knight Tuulen once again, discovering an imminent threat in Star Point.

externalcorruption.name: External Corruption
externalcorruption.description: You discovered the secrets of the Exalted Reverie, and learned more of the past of the dreamscape.

acharmingproposition.name: A Charming Proposition
acharmingproposition.description: You learned more about Charms, and conquered Vibrant Hollow.

scientistsofsteelmeldiii.name: Scientists of Steelmeld III
scientistsofsteelmeldiii.description: You rescued IOTA from Bermuda's malfunctioning lab.

intothewoods.name: Into the Woods
intothewoods.description: You assisted the city of Galengarde with a number of tasks to earn an audience with their leaders.

keeperagents.name: Keeper Agents
keeperagents.description: You uncovered a dark secret about the doctor of New Antium with help from the High Priest.

sleepingshadows.name: Sleeping Shadows
sleepingshadows.description: Assist Squire Firwold in his reseach on the shadowy creatures you may have encountered in the dreamscape.

ofmushroomsandmagic.name: Of Mushrooms and Magic
ofmushroomsandmagic.description: You attempted to make peace with the Mycelia, but instead found allies within the Coven.

thescoutscodex.name: The Scout's Codex
thescoutscodex.description: You helped Laura find her diary. With the information stored in the book, the northern path to Sierhaven may be a lot safer now!

castingforhelp.name: Casting for Help
castingforhelp.description: Working with Nurse Deidre, you made a cast for Melinda and repaired more than just a bone.

snowmanleftbehind.name: Snow Man Left Behind
snowmanleftbehind.description: The hunt for the Snow Wool led you to its destruction, and you battled its spirit to save the holidays!

outerdemons.name: Outer Demons
outerdemons.description: What seemed like a mission to find a lost book turned into a search through the mysterious Grove, where you encountered the demon summoner Azacor.

theeldersscrolls.name: The Elder's Scrolls
theeldersscrolls.description: When T'Xoc asked for your help to locate a missing Tlaxan Elder, you followed their trail back to the Verdant Fortress... What lurks inside?

truegenius.name: True Genius
truegenius.description: You have earned the title of Dreamwalker by interacting with the dreamers.

crazycupidlove.name: Crazy, Cupid, Love
crazycupidlove.description: You solved mysterious puzzles leading to Psychie's lost love, Cupid.

apigculiarproblem.name: A Pigculiar Problem
apigculiarproblem.description: You've learned the secrets of how pigs can speak and helped Walter Jr. live his dream.

astudyincrimsontwo.name: A Study in Crimson Part Two
astudyincrimsontwo.description: Working again with the Crimson King, you searched past and present for the lost Silver Knight. You found it, dead, below the Monument, leaving the future uncertain.

missingsoldiers.name: Missing Soldiers
missingsoldiers.description: Sergeant Sigrun needed your help finding her soldiers. Unfortunately, the Jaguar Tribes found them first.

starriestnight.name: Starriest Night
starriestnight.description: You repaired the telescope, but something more sinister is yet to unfold...

astudyincrimsonone.name: A Study in Crimson Part One
astudyincrimsonone.description: The Crimson King called in your contract. You worked with him to dig through memories, searching for a way to restore the Crimson Wool.

ofmonksandmagic.name: Of Monks and Magic
ofmonksandmagic.description: You saved the Axtan Monks from the Sons of the Forest, a shadowy cabal of druids.

bandittroubles.name: Bandit Troubles
bandittroubles.description: Raiding two bandit camps, you learned the truth of Octavius's shady business dealings.

glooperduper.name: Glooper Duper
glooperduper.description: You helped a strange man in the Swamp find dinner.

wuhl.name: Words Upon Hushed Lips
wuhl.description: Dimitri's mentor, Ignos, has vanished, but you found closure and a clue in his cryptic journal.

alittlespark.name: A Little Spark
alittlespark.description: You helped Cinevra out by getting her an arc-crystal.

theplague.name: The Plague
theplague.description: Nyr was at risk of falling to a deadly plague, but you and C'Taz created an ancient medicine to save the town.

creeperjuice.name: Creeperjuice
creeperjuice.description: In trying to help Creeper Fanatic Boris spread delight to Creeperkind, you instead battled a horrifying demonic creeper from beyond.

heroreturn.name: A Hero's Return
heroreturn.description: Choose your class proper and carry on with your adventure!

halidssong.name: Halid's Song
halidssong.description: You helped an old Tlaxan regain his musical talent, and got music of your own in return...

tlaxantroubles.name: Tlaxan Troubles
tlaxantroubles.description: T'Lm told you of his people's hidden town, Ta'Eldim. While you have gained entry, not all the townspeople trust you yet...

sonsoftheforest.name: Sons of the Forest
sonsoftheforest.description: You stole a powerful binding spell from the Sons of the Forest, hindering their plans! No doubt they are planning their revenge...

buriedblade.name: Buried Blade
buriedblade.description: A landslide ruined Blackjack Stan's smuggling den. Of course, he sent you into a deadly cave to retrieve a sword he needed.

cluckedup.name: Clucked Up
cluckedup.description: You went on a clucking silly adventure, and defeated the god of pigs.

fountainofmiracles.name: Fountain of Miracles
fountainofmiracles.description: You've purified the waters of the Fountain of Miracles, corrupted by dark magic from deep in the jungle.

memoriesofbattle.name: Memories of Battle
memoriesofbattle.description: You investigated the secrets of the Arena, instead discovering the Crimson King was involved the whole time.

dishtodiefor.name: A Dish To Die For
dishtodiefor.description: You helped Claude make his culinary masterpiece. After fighting him, his appetite for human flesh should be gone.

truergenius.name: Truer Genius
truergenius.description: You have continued your journey of Dreamwalker, into realms never before walked.

intothinair.name: Into Thin Air
intothinair.description: Following in the footsteps of Aurora, you discovered the truth behind her disappearance...

clearasglass.name: Clear As Glass
clearasglass.description: After defeating Virius, Nelfine's memory has truly returned and with it her friendship with Arian.

starriernight.name: Starrier Night
starriernight.description: You repaired another spyglass, this time for Mayleen's friend Montana. While secretive, it seems there's more here than just stargazing...

lostinmymind.name: Lost in My Mind
lostinmymind.description: A secret warehouse lies beneath Sierhaven, filled with missing people. Eowen has closure, but mysteries still remain.

mageslegacy.name: Mage's Legacy
mageslegacy.description: Helping Archmage Vargos, you translated an ancient Tlaxan poem and learned the tragic history of the mage council.

burningbright.name: Burning Bright
burningbright.description: Because of your actions, Oceangate Lighthouse burns brighter than ever before.

flashinthepan.name: Flash in the Pan
flashinthepan.description: You've completed a race around Sierhaven. Search towns around the world for more races.

allthatremains.name: All That Remains
allthatremains.description: You managed to discover the fate of Aphelios and destroy one of the Andromeda shards, but the Ones From Above are still watching...

unveiled.name: Unveiled
unveiled.description: The Masked Man, an agent of Calder, has been stopped and the Black Shard reclaimed from the Sons of the Forest. They will no longer threaten the valley with their dark magic.

supplyanddemand.name: Supply and Demand
supplyanddemand.description: After running around Sierhaven, you helped deliver a package of supplies to Melinda in the eastern district.

baneofthebakers.name: Bane of the Bakers
baneofthebakers.description: Stefan needed a pretzel recipe, and you stole it for him in exchange for some strange rewards.

thecrystalconnection.name: The Crystal Connection
thecrystalconnection.description: Overcoming another trip into Velara and an attack by the Sons of the Forest, you connected Ta'Eldim and Sierhaven.

avaultofglass.name: A Vault of Glass
avaultofglass.description: Commanded by the Order of Glass to uncover Octavius's misdeeds, you failed when the evidence was taken by Duchess Emmeline.

lightsbeyond.name: Lights Beyond
lightsbeyond.description: The lights have shown you the way in the darkness, where you found a strange letter...

acrewtoremember.name: A Crew to Remember
acrewtoremember.description: Captain Indigo now has a motley crew of eccentric pirates, ready to sail thanks to your help.

acrownofmadness.name: A Crown of Madness
acrownofmadness.description: Aimee has been cured and the King has been saved from the plot of a sneaky Son of the Forest.

abeastofabook.name: A Beast of a Book
abeastofabook.description: You learned from an expert hunter and earned your own Bestiary.

pyromania.name: Pyromania
pyromania.description: Braving several lava-filled caverns, you brought Carbocius magma samples from around the valley.

siegeofhighwatch.name: Siege of Highwatch
siegeofhighwatch.description: Highwatch is saved from a swarm of ghasts and blazes, and you've uncovered the true plans of the Sons of the Forest.

missingpet.name: Runaway Pet
missingpet.description: You reunited Leonard and his adorable pet Mr. Snuggles.

acrownofmajesty.name: A Crown of Majesty
acrownofmajesty.description: After assisting a jeweler named Aimee, she now has everything she needs to make a crown for King Petrus II.

timetoreflect.name: Time to Reflect
timetoreflect.description: By solving the mirror puzzles in Ta'Eldim's shrine, you gained the trust of Barras, the Shrinetender.

finishedbusiness.name: Finished Business
finishedbusiness.description: You helped a weird little man be slightly less weird and stop writing fanfiction about you.

arclightandroyalblue.name: Arclight and Royal Blue
arclightandroyalblue.description: You delivered flowers for the Arcmage and learnt about her and her partner. Also Elcard died.

nelfinescurse.name: Nelfine's Curse
nelfinescurse.description: You helped restore Nelfine's memory. Hopefully she'll remember more and more with time...

starrynight.name: Starry Night
starrynight.description: By breaking into an armory and spinning gears, you helped Mayleen fix her telescope.

thesalmon.name: The Salmon
thesalmon.description: You caught a royal fish (with strange defenders) and won a fishing contest. Display the trophy proudly.

scientistsofsteelmeld2.name: Scientists of Steelmeld II
scientistsofsteelmeld2.description: You have completed even more of the Professor's challenges... for science!

theendchimes.name: The End Chimes
theendchimes.description: Following the ramblings of a drunken pirate, you discovered the ghost ship of Captain Varcosa - the Black Mist.

primevalcreations6.name: Primeval Creations VI
primevalcreations6.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Cyan and Purple Wools.

longwaydown.name: Long Way Down
longwaydown.description: You've assisted Myra in conquering her fear.

alostcause.name: A Lost Cause
alostcause.description: The Ishnir Trade may have suffered a catastrophic loss, but with your help they should be able to recover.

masterofall.name: Master of All
masterofall.description: Complete all Specialization Trials in the Celsian Isles.

xenophobia.name: Xenophobia
xenophobia.description: You searched out clues for Xeno and discovered his connection with Calder.

primevalcreations2.name: Primeval Creations II
primevalcreations2.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Orange and Magenta Wools.

deathsswiftness.name: Death's Swiftness
deathsswiftness.description: You fought illusions of the past and learned the Harbinger Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

alichinthesystem.name: A Lich in the System
alichinthesystem.description: With the help of some researchers, you fought against the former Vizier of Al Malakut, Hekawt, now a lich, and prevented him from causing further destruction.

primevalcreations013.name: Primeval Creations: 013-2 Wools
primevalcreations013.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Teal Wool, and Selari's future plans.

silverskinned.name: Silver Skinned
silverskinned.description: Joining back up with Fred, you uncovered lingering questions about the Shifting City and its origin.

bleedingproof.name: Bleeding Proof
bleedingproof.description: You sought out a survivor of the Congress, but things didn't quite go as expected.

healthfulnetworking.name: Healthful Networking
healthfulnetworking.description: You helped Ellen establish a communication network and learned the Seraph Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

treasureofthepast.name: Treasure of the Past
treasureofthepast.description: You've found an ancient temple of the Viridian Empire and retrieved a cursed artifact.

analcoholicaccord.name: An Alcoholic Accord
analcoholicaccord.description: You helped Levyn with a deal to get information, but ended up getting tricked in the process.

aimingforsuccess.name: Aiming For Success
aimingforsuccess.description: You passed the Frostgate Target Test and learned the Ranger Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

guardingtheguarded.name: Guarding the Guarded
guardingtheguarded.description: You helped Galablad protect Grethony and learned the Guardian Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

anunexpectedlesson.name: An Unexpected Lesson
anunexpectedlesson.description: The Duchess called upon you once again, and an unnerving secret was uncovered about Salieri's past.

primevalcreations3.name: Primeval Creations III
primevalcreations3.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Light Blue and Yellow Wools.

lifeisoftheessence.name: Life Is Of The Essence
lifeisoftheessence.description: You helped Bero continue his experiments and learned the Reaper Specialization. Found in the Viridian Overworld.

whatlieswithin.name: What Lies Within
whatlieswithin.description: You unlocked your subconscious through meditation and learned the Elementalist Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

voyageofdiscovery.name: Voyage of Discovery
voyageofdiscovery.description: You assembled your pirate crew once again and embarked on a journey to the Celsian Isles.

deservedrest.name: A Well Deserved Rest
deservedrest.description: You may have destroyed the castle's floor and table, but the Marshall can get some rest.

unyieldingpotential.name: Unyielding Potential
unyieldingpotential.description: You defeated Richter the Unyielding and learned the Swordsage Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

tenthousandbets.name: Ten Thousand Bets
tenthousandbets.description: You retrieved Myriad's lost chestplate, but his luck remains missing...

theroostercrowsatmidnight.name: The Rooster Crows at Midnight
theroostercrowsatmidnight.description: You've proven yourself to the Night Roosters and joined their ranks.

stablemastersrequest.name: Stablemaster's Request
stablemastersrequest.description: Now Miane's stable is full of life once more!

outwithabang.name: Out With A Bang
outwithabang.description: Ebonee and her friends are now known among their peers for legendary pranks.

depthscharge.name: Depths Charge
depthscharge.description: Following the path of a Lieutenant of the Black Mist, you discovered a Breach below the ocean where something evil approaches.

purtrefactionandpurification.name: Purtrefaction and Purification
purtrefactionandpurification.description: You slayed a Wither and learned the Paladin Specialization. Found in Nightroost.

theforeignsoldier.name: The Foreign Soldier
theforeignsoldier.description: You searched out information about the truth of the war, and ended up siding with a nation.

primevalcreations5.name: Primeval Creations V
primevalcreations5.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Gray and Light Gray Wools.

overdoomed.name: Overdoomed
overdoomed.description: Retrieved by any means necessary, the book is now back in Saanavi's hands.

pyreandprejudice.name: Pyre and Prejudice
pyreandprejudice.description: You've assisted Nitreia in fixing Steelmeld's agricultural problems.

kingdomoflies.name: Kingdom Of Lies
kingdomoflies.description: You rooted out the Masked in Ishnir's government after getting unexpectedly arrested.

atoweringobjective.name: A Towering Objective
atoweringobjective.description: You assisted in disrupting a tower's magic and learned the Berserker Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

primevalcreations1.name: Primeval Creations I
primevalcreations1.description: You discovered the workshop of a mysterious man named Selari and learned more about the nature of the White Wool.

asunkenfeeling.name: A Sunken Feeling
asunkenfeeling.description: You helped save Mistport's massive underground farm.

amerchantswoe.name: A Merchant's Woe
amerchantswoe.description: You've helped Riaz recover his lost supplies.

guildingblocks.name: Guilding Blocks
guildingblocks.description: The truth of the Ishnir Trade Guild has come to light, and you helped them forge a path to a better future.

anotherworldlyhunt.name: An Otherworldly Hunt
anotherworldlyhunt.description: You gather the pelts of rare creatures and learned the Hunter Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

wizardsapprentice.name: The Wizard's Apprentice
wizardsapprentice.description: You investigated the death of Vargos' apprentice and found Xeno at the center of the incident.

fishybusiness.name: Fishy Business
fishybusiness.description: Whether you like it or not, Lincoln's pesky client has been dealt with.

scientistsofsteelmeld1.name: Scientists of Steelmeld I
scientistsofsteelmeld1.description: You have completed the Professor's challenges... for now.

thedoctorsorders.name: The Doctor's Orders
thedoctorsorders.description: You helped find a 'cure' for the queen of Frostgate and learned the Apothecary Specialization. Found in Frostgate.

raidingparty.name: Raiding Party
raidingparty.description: You assisted Captain Lamis and ended up getting attacked by a strange assailant.

sabotage.name: Sabotage
sabotage.description: The Fist of Turaal is operational once again now that you have helped Lt. Aulber.

fableddestiny.name: Fabled Destiny
fableddestiny.description: You've helped Herriot realise a new destiny which is awaiting for him.

flockandkey.name: Flock and Key
flockandkey.description: Your first initial heist as a Night Rooster.

anunlikelypartnership.name: An Unlikely Partnership
anunlikelypartnership.description: The Duchess used you to spy on diplomats. Will it be you that puts an end to her reign of terror?

ashamanslament.name: A Shaman's Lament
ashamanslament.description: You helped C'Rondis perform a ritual and unlocked the Soothsayer specialization. Found in Mistport.

treasureforthefuture.name: Treasure for the Future
treasureforthefuture.description: You discovered ruins beneath the Silver Tower, and activated an ancient mechanism. The ruins collapsed behind you as you escaped, leaving the artifacts and the knight sealed within...

vitalneeds.name: Vital Needs
vitalneeds.description: Now with the Doctor's ingredients retrieved, you have gained access to his remedy in Mistport!

astrokeofgenius.name: A Stroke of Genius
astrokeofgenius.description: You helped Atiuh break a Hex below Viridia and unlocked the Hexbreaker specialization. Found in the Viridian Isles Overworld.

bloodybanquet.name: Bloody Banquet
bloodybanquet.description: You investigated a brutal murder of a rich Countess! You caught the murderer! He's behind bars... for now.

asimplefavor.name: A Simple Favor
asimplefavor.description: You assisted in retrieving a hitlist from pirates and learned the Assassin Specialization. Found in Mistport.

bringhimbaack.name: Bring Him Baack
bringhimbaack.description: You followed a mysterious and baffling trail that may have brought back a friend...

borrowedtime.name: Borrowed Time
borrowedtime.description: After much debate with your allies, you brought the Crimson King to the Isles and survived a clash with the Teal Spirit. However, there is still more to do...

masterofone.name: Master of One
masterofone.description: You helped out the Teacher in Mistport to reopen the Specialization School.

heretherebedragons.name: Here There Be Dragons
heretherebedragons.description: Working with Izzy, Levyn, and clearly Not Samwell, you went on a piratey adventure and discovered something below the City of Bones.

risforreprisal.name: R Is For Reprisal
risforreprisal.description: You rooted out the Masked in the Chillwind's government while trying to protect Wispervale from Mage Hunters.

alricslegacy.name: Alric's Legacy
alricslegacy.description: You learned from the Giant slayer himself and fought a Giant yourself, preventing total destruction of the Isles.

primevalcreations39.name: Primeval Creations III.9
primevalcreations39.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Crimson Wool and Selari himself.

lostinthedark.name: Lost in the Dark
lostinthedark.description: You found your way through a very dark maze and learned the Tenebrist Specialization. Found in Alnera.

primevalcreations4.name: Primeval Creations IV
primevalcreations4.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Lime and Pink Wools.

oldermagic.name: Older Magic
oldermagic.description: You helped create a barrier spell and learned the Arcanist Specialization. Found in Rahkeri.

dealbreaker.name: Dealbreaker
dealbreaker.description: Safar was pleased with your work, The Ishnir Trade knows of your name now...
